description: This file contains unit tests for the React component 'App', focusing on chat and preview functionalities within the application. It uses testing-library/react to simulate user interactions and verify UI behavior.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for 'App integration (chat-only layout)'.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for specific functionalities like rendering, prompt submission, reset behavior, and button state.
